meanings.definition: A building where hens are kept.
meanings.sent1: The farmer built a new henhouse for his chickens.
meanings.sent2: The henhouse in the backyard is painted red.
meanings.sent3: Why did the henhouse go to the doctor? It had a bad case of the coop cough!
meanings.sent4: The henhouse stood tall like a fortress protecting the hens.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh hay in the henhouse filled the air.

meanings.definition: A place where hens lay eggs.
meanings.sent1: The henhouse was filled with freshly laid eggs every morning.
meanings.sent2: The farmer collected the eggs from the henhouse daily.
meanings.sent3: Why did the henhouse throw a party? To celebrate the egg-cellent production!
meanings.sent4: The henhouse was a treasure trove of golden eggs.
meanings.sent5: The henhouse echoed with the clucking of content hens.
